com.saucelabs.ci.sauceconnect

Class AbstractSauceTunnelManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.saucelabs.ci.sauceconnect.AbstractSauceTunnelManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SauceTunnelManager
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SauceConnectFourManager

    public abstract class AbstractSauceTunnelManager
extends Object
implements SauceTunnelManager
    Provides common logic for the invocation of Sauce Connect v3 and v4 processes. The class maintains a cache of Process instances mapped against the corresponding Sauce user which invoked Sauce Connect.
    Author:
    Ross Rowe

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  AbstractSauceTunnelManager.SauceConnectDidNotStartException
      Exception which is thrown when Sauce Connect does not start within the timeout period.

      Base exception class which is thrown if an error occurs launching Sauce Connect.
      protected class  AbstractSauceTunnelManager.StreamGobbler
      Handles receiving and processing the output of an external process.
      class  AbstractSauceTunnelManager.SystemErrorGobbler
      Handles processing Sauce Connect output sent to stderr.
      class  AbstractSauceTunnelManager.SystemOutGobbler
      Handles processing Sauce Connect output sent to stdout.

      • prepAndCreateProcess

        protected abstract Process prepAndCreateProcess(String username,
                                                String apiKey,
                                                int port,
                                                File sauceConnectJar,
                                                String options,
                                                PrintStream printStream,
                                                String sauceConnectPath)
                                         throws AbstractSauceTunnelManager.SauceConnectException
        Parameters:
        username - name of the user which launched Sauce Connect
        apiKey - api key corresponding to the user
        port - port which Sauce Connect should be launched on
        sauceConnectJar - File which contains the Sauce Connect executables (typically the CI plugin Jar file)
        options - the command line options used to launch Sauce Connect
        printStream - the output stream to send log messages
        sauceConnectPath - if defined, Sauce Connect will be launched from the specified path and won't be extracted from the jar file
        Returns:
        new ProcessBuilder instance which will launch Sauce Connect
        Throws:
        AbstractSauceTunnelManager.SauceConnectException - thrown if an error occurs launching the Sauce Connect process

      • createProcess

        protected Process createProcess(String[] args,
                                File directory)
                         throws IOException
        Parameters:
        args - Arguments to run
        directory - Directory to run in
        Returns:
        Processbuilder to run
        Throws:
        IOException - thrown if an error occurs launching the Sauce Connect process

      • openConnection

        public Process openConnection(String username,
                              String apiKey,
                              int port,
                              File sauceConnectJar,
                              String options,
                              PrintStream printStream,
                              Boolean verboseLogging,
                              String sauceConnectPath)
                       throws AbstractSauceTunnelManager.SauceConnectException
        Creates a new process to run Sauce Connect.
        Specified by:
        openConnection in interface SauceTunnelManager
        Parameters:
        username - the name of the Sauce OnDemand user
        apiKey - the API Key for the Sauce OnDemand user
        port - the port which Sauce Connect should be run on
        sauceConnectJar - the Jar file containing Sauce Connect. If null, then we attempt to find Sauce Connect from the classpath (only used by SauceConnectTwoManager)
        options - the command line options to pass to Sauce Connect
        printStream - A print stream in which to redirect the output from Sauce Connect to. Can be null
        verboseLogging - indicates whether verbose logging should be output
        sauceConnectPath - if defined, Sauce Connect will be launched from the specified path and won't be extracted from the jar file
        Returns:
        a Process instance which represents the Sauce Connect instance
        Throws:
        AbstractSauceTunnelManager.SauceConnectException - thrown if an error occurs launching Sauce Connect

        protected abstract String getCurrentVersion()

      • generateSauceConnectArgs

        protected String[] generateSauceConnectArgs(String[] args,
                                            String username,
                                            String apiKey,
                                            int port,
                                            String options)
        Returns the arguments to be used to launch Sauce Connect
        Parameters:
        args - the initial Sauce Connect command line args
        username - name of the user which launched Sauce Connect
        apiKey - the access key for the Sauce user
        port - the port that Sauce Connect should be launched on
        options - command line args specified by the user
        Returns:
        String array representing the command line args to be used to launch Sauce Connect
